definitions: in a very serious, gloomy, or depressing manner

examples.text: the commander grimly predicted that violence could return

definitions: in a manner that is apparently humorous but lacks genuine levity

examples.text: he smiled grimly at his own misery
sad as I am, another part of me is grimly amused

shortDefinitions: in manner that is apparently humorous but lacks genuine levity

definitions: in an unrelenting manner despite hardship

examples.text: she had a grimly determined look on her face
Portugal grimly hung on to her African possessions well into the 1970s
